country: Spain; Chile; France; USA; New Zealand
description: The study reviews the impacts of the invasive New Zealand mud snail on ecosystem properties and services, highlighting both positive and negative effects.
note: No economic assessment of the impacts of the NZMS is available in the literature.
respondent__evidence: Overall, 70 professional small-scale fishers participated in the survey.
type_of_study__evidence: Gain and loss of money in a choice experiment.
